### Goal

Through your [First Project](first-project.qmd) and continued learning you will start getting a better sense of the team and discover more of your role. You will also start to get a sense of how our team relates to the company at large.

### Tasks

-   Discuss with your manager: [Minimum four weeks vacation policy](https://rstudiopbc.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PEO/pages/36506752/Paid+Time+Off+PTO)
-   Complete your [First Project](first-project.qmd) with your buddy
-   Watch [Hello Quarto: Share • Collaborate • Teach • Reimagine](https://www.rstudio.com/conference/2022/keynotes/collaborate-with-quarto/)
-   Find us in the [Open Source Group](https://rstudiopbc.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OPESOUGRO/overview) and add your name to our group
-   Check out and attend your first [AMA, Virtual Donut, Virtual Coffee, Board Readouts](https://docs.google.com/document/d/115FzeIsbga04ajesN_WonU4ThXp9uQTP1jGP7pIUUqI/edit)
